itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the many ways Jarred could have contracted E. Coli, go through the contributors of “We Are The World” in light of Jarred’s unfortunate illness, what shutting down whole states due to coronavirus will do to travel a...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the many ways Jarred could have contracted E. Coli, go through the contributors of “We Are The World” in light of Jarred’s unfortunate illness, what shutting down whole states due to coronavirus will do to travel and the economy, and end the show with a gambit of COVID-19 conspiracy theories.
